name: bc-ndshfsem3
description: Offizielles Repository zur Semesterarbeit NDS HF Applikationsentwickler im dritten Semester von Claudia Martinez & Marco Rensch

scripts.postinstall: concurrently -m=1 -n=Server,Client,Setup -c=magenta,cyan,yellow -i=true --default-input-target=2 "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install" "npm:setup"
scripts.devStart: concurrently -n=Server,Client -c=magenta,cyan "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run serve"
